summary: Comprehensive testing of User Profile Pages (Account, Voice Studio, System Settings, Accessibility) and Live Radio Integration on Discover page. All features working correctly. Backend APIs (9/9 tests passed) and Frontend UI (all pages loading with correct data-testid attributes).
critical_code_review_comments: All 4 User Profile pages implemented correctly with proper data-testid attributes
Settings menu in sidebar expands to show ACCOUNT, VOICES, SYSTEM, ACCESS sub-navigation
Live Radio Integration uses Radio Browser API (de1.api.radio-browser.info) - NOT MOCKED
All API endpoints returning correct data structures
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: User Profile pages and Live Radio fully tested. Key data-testids: account-page, voice-studio-page, system-settings-page, accessibility-page, discover-page, sidebar-account/voices/system/access, toggle-high-contrast, toggle-haptic, slider-alert-volume, slider-data-limit, font-scale-slider, gesture-swipe, gesture-pinch, radio-country-{code}, radio-station-{id}, radio-play-btn, radio-volume

account_page.subscription_info: PASS - Premium Broadcast plan displayed with [PROTO_ID: PRM-BC-26]
account_page.system_alerts: PASS - NEW_FEATURE: HUB_ANALYTICS and MAINTENANCE_DOWNTIME alerts visible
account_page.region_status: PASS - Lagos, NG with LAT/LON coordinates and HUB_LOAD indicator

voice_studio_page.broadcast_preview: PASS - Waveform visualization with play controls

accessibility_page.output_preview: PASS - Live preview of headline and body text
accessibility_page.voice_commands_section: PASS - LISTENING_V2 indicator with active commands

discover_page_live_radio.live_broadcast_hero: PASS - LIVE_BROADCAST badge with SIGNAL_STRONG // ARC_NODE_01
discover_page_live_radio.podcast_play_buttons: PASS - [ LISTEN_CMD ] buttons on each podcast
discover_page_live_radio.country_filters: PASS - NG, GH, KE, ZA, EG, MA country buttons with flags
discover_page_live_radio.nigeria_stations: PASS - RFI HAOUSSA, NIGERIAN GOSPEL MUSIC RADIO, RADIO EAST, METRO FM LAGOS
discover_page_live_radio.ghana_stations: PASS - CITI FM, AKOMAPA FM, SWEET MELODIES, ADUM RADIO
discover_page_live_radio.now_playing_section: PASS - NOW_PLAYING with station name and bitrate
discover_page_live_radio.live_indicator: PASS - LIVE indicator shows when station selected

sidebar_navigation.settings_menu: PASS - Expandable SETTINGS menu in sidebar

backend_api_tests.voices_endpoint: PASS - /api/voices returns 5 voice profiles (NOVA, ONYX, ECHO, ALLOY, SHIMMER)
backend_api_tests.news_endpoint: PASS - /api/news returns news items for Discover page
